content.rendered:
Gangotri Yatra By Helicopter Tour Package

Home » India » Uttarakhand » Gangotri » Gangotri Yatra By Helicopter

Tour Overview

As the name suggests Gangotri dham is dedicated to goddess Ganga who had made her way to earth after heavy penance performed by King Bhagirath. The temple can be easily reached and is known for its stunning, glistening beauty. This holy and heavenly temple is one of the rare temples that are dedicated to the goddess. Here is a 1 day itinerary of Gangotri dham yatra by helicopter.

Gangotri Yatra by Helicopter Tour Itinerary

Day 1 :Dehradun – Gangotri

7:00 Am – departure from the Sahastradhara airport at Dehradun. Be sure to report at the helipad on time in order to avoid some unnecessary hassle.

8:00 Am – you will be reaching Harsil after 1 hour of travelling. From Harsil you will be immediately assisted for darshan at the Gangotri Dham where you will be receiving a priority darshan Pass.

11:00 Am – You will then leave Harsil and make your way to the helipad at Dehradun. You will be given a limited time of 3.5 to 4 hours to complete your darshan rituals and explore some nearby places of tourist interest.

12 Noon – after completing an hour of journey you will be finally reaching the Sahastradhara airport at Dehradun which will mark the end of your journey with us.

Price Details

Tour Name Gangotri Yatra By Helicopter
Duration 1 Day (Same Day Return)
Destinations Dehradun → Gangotri → Dehradun
Tour Price 80,000 /-

Chat with specialist who can help plan your tour!

  • +91-9711616316

    Holiday Your Way with Namaste India Trip!

    Filling out the information form provided allows you to receive the best budget-friendly customized itinerary in just a few hours.

    • We assure the privacy of your contact data.

    • This data will only be used by our team to contact you and no other purposes.

    Trip Highlights

    • VIP darshan experience
    • Additional sightseeing (if any)
    • Scenic drive from airport to the temple
    • Exciting helicopter ride
    • Stay in luxury accommodation

    Package Inclusion

    • Helicopter ticket
    • Meals as per itinerary
    • Accommodation as per itinerary
    • Pickup and drop off service
    • Ground handling charges, driver allowance etc

    Terms and Conditions

    • 1 helicopter will only be able to accommodate just 4 passengers which is done after appropriate weight checkups and adjustments. Although the helicopter company tries to group you in one but do not expect this to happen since they need to adjust the weight everywhere and accommodate people keeping in mind the safety of the passengers.
    • Remember that the helicopter only allows 5 kgs on board. Avoid carrying bulky and large bags and suitcases since there is limited seating space inside the helicopter. You can carry a small backpack consisting only of your essential needs on the journey. Excessive baggage will not be allowed on the helicopter.
    • Helicopter prices are subject to change without any prior notice. It will be vital for you to confirm the prices beforehand.
    • It is Helicopter Company’s policy to carry only an overall passenger weight of 250 – 300 kgs and not more than that in order to ensure the safety of the passengers travelling.
    • Anybody who may seem questionable to the crew or anybody else from the helicopter company then they reserve the right to deny their services to them without giving any prior notice or explanation.

    Cancellation Policy

    • 30 days or more prior to the commencement of the journey – 10% of the overall amount.
    • 15 to 30 days prior to the commencement of the journey – 50% of the overall amount.
    • Within 15 days prior to the commencement of the journey – zero refund
    • Important note – in case of unexpected natural disasters like road blockages or something else then no refunds will be made.

    General Instructions for the Passengers

    • The helicopter services for Gangotri dham will be operated from the helipad at Harsil which is situated at a mere distance of 25 mines and it will be covered via a road journey.
    • Every helicopter passenger returning the same day will be provided with a priority darshan slip for a quicker darshan.
    • Infants will have to be accompanied with an adult passenger. Children who are 2 years and above require a full adult ticket.
    • No concessions are provided for infants, children and other senior citizens.
    • In case the journey is not completed with some remaining dhams due to bad weather conditions then the company will be liable for refund of all the unutilized sectors of the yatra journey.
    • The rescheduling or changing of the dates is eligible depending on the availability of the dates later on.

    FAQs for Gangotri Yatra By Helicopter

    Q. Which is the helipad for Gangotri dham?

    A. Harsil helipad is the designated helipad for Gangotri dham.

    Q. What are the top tourist attractions in Gangotri?

    A. Top attractions in Gangotri are: Gaumukh glacier, Harsil, Dharali, Mukhba, Jalmagna shivling etc.

    Q. Which is the best month to visit Gangotri?

    A. April to June is the best month to visit Gangotri.

    Q. How far is the Gangotri helipad from the main temple?

    A. The helipad is 24 kms away from the main temple that takes about an hour to cover by road.

    Q. Can we go to Gangotri by our own car?

    A. Yes. You can travel to Gangotri in your own car.
